modShortDescription: Adds the unfinished A16 behemoth and the A17 unfinished radiated behemoth to the game. Random spawns in the wasteland and horde nights.
modDescription:
Adds the unfinished A16 [behemoth](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) and the A17 unfinished radiated behemoth to the game. Random spawns in the wasteland and horde nights.

## Changelog

* **_(new)_** Localization fixes.
* Updated for A20!
* Pushed a small patch because it’s hits were wonky. Just an XML tweak. Side note, KhaineGB had to increase it’s range, which means it’ll struggle to hit you if you get close.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/KhaineGB/KhaineA20ModletsXML/tree/main/KHA20-TFPBehemoth)** for A20  
**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-TFPBehemoth)** for A19

If you appreciate KhaineGB’s work and you want to show support, use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/khainegb).

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25751-khaines-a20-modlets-bigger-backpacks-lockable-slots-behemoths-random-wandering-hordes-etc/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
